title: WTB: T206 McBride, Pastorius, McIntyre (Brooklyn), Steinfeldt (port)
author: Anthony S.

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 McBride, Pastorius, McIntyre (Brooklyn), Steinfeldt (port)
posts.post_content:
Looking for the following T206:

1) McBride
2) McIntyre (Brooklyn)
3) Pastorius
4) Steinfeldt (portrait)

Important:  I'm only looking for cards that are completely crease and wrinkle free.  Also, no paper loss.

Basically, I'm looking for these cards in approximately SGC 40- 50 type condition.  Though if the card is trimmed a bit, that's okay (provided you let me know beforehand).  They can be graded or ungraded, as long as they meet the aforementioned specs.  Also, if you're looking to sell your PSA 6 or SGC 80, I'm sure the card looks great, but it's probably outside the range I'm looking to pay.

my email:  [url]boboinnes33@gmail.com[/url]
